SECTION_TECHNOLOGY.TITLE: Technologies
SECTION_TECHNOLOGY.DESCRIPTION: Take a look at the technologies I use to help my clients build their projects. These tools are carefully selected to ensure maximum efficiency and the best fit for each challenge.

ABOUT_1.TITLE: Software developer, Analyst and Designer
ABOUT_1.DESCRIPTION_1: With over 6 years of experience in software development and 3 years in web design, I specialize in creating both websites and mobile applications.
ABOUT_1.DESCRIPTION_2: I value investing time with the client to create a positive connection and gather all the details, which then facilitates workflow and ensures maximum efficiency and satisfaction

ABOUT_2.TITLE: Sports and outdoor activities
ABOUT_2.DESCRIPTION_1: When I'm not programming, I like to spend my time outdoors playing sports or walking in the park. I'm a big fan of almost all sports, especially those that use a racket. I highly value nature and animals, but I'm not particularly fond of insects.

ABOUT_3.TITLE: Multimedia, video games and creativity.
ABOUT_3.DESCRIPTION_1: Music, photography, drawing, and art in general represent a fundamental part of who I am. They ignite my creative side, helping me bring fresh and innovative ideas when developing software. Since I was young, I’ve been a big fan of video games because they transport me to another world where I can unleash my imagination. My favorite genres are MMO-RPGs, fantasy RPGs, arcades, and adventure games.

OBJECTIVES_SECTION.TITLE: Objectives
OBJECTIVES_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: I currently aim to become a full-stack developer. I began my journey in the web and mobile world in 2021, and I aspire to work at a company with a great team of professionals from whom I can learn and to whom I can contribute my knowledge to achieve goals.

DETAILS.DETAIL_1: Gathered requirements from clients and discussed the website design.
DETAILS.DETAIL_2: Created a mockup and built the website using Astro, Javascript and Tailwind.

DETAILS.DETAIL_1: Built and maintained website from scratch with Wordpress and MySQL.
DETAILS.DETAIL_2: Produced and posted SEO-friendly online content.
DETAILS.DETAIL_3: Researched new trends in blogging to create blog posts to be entertaining and engaging.

DETAILS.DETAIL_1: Modified the existing infrastructure of the financial system to expand its capabilities. Added new features to make the web more interactive and accessible using Genexus, RPG and SQL.
DETAILS.DETAIL_2: Favorably supported interdepartmental teams to implement and test new modules to the comprehensive bank system.
DETAILS.DETAIL_3: Utilized intensive testing regimen in all environments (development, testing) before going to production.

DETAILS.DETAIL_2: Provided student recruiting and orientation support at expos to promote the college at various events.
